greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Gaps associated with the arithmetic progressions of semiprimes in A096003.
comment: The terms a(1),a(2) and a(3) are omitted to avoid the ambiguity caused by the two progressions of length 3 ending at A096003(3)=14: a(3)=5 for (4,9,14) or a(3)=4 for (6,10,14).
example: a(6)=4 because the 6 semiprimes in the progression ending at A096003(6)=221 are separated by an increment of 4: 201=3*67, 205=5*41, 209=11*19, 213=3*71, 217=7*31, 221=13*17.
xref: Cf. A096003, A093364 gaps in arithmetic progressions of primes, A082919 clusters of 8 consecutive semiprimes.
results.author: _Hugo Pfoertner_, Aug 27 2004
